    • Constructor Detail

      • Contract

        public Contract()
        Create the default contract (1NT by North).

      • Contract

        public Contract(int rank,
                int strain,
                int doubled,
                int declarer)
        Create a contract from four ints.
        Parameters:
        rank - 0-7, inclusive
        strain - Rules.CLUBS, Rules.DIAMONDS, Rules.HEARTS, Rules.SPADES, or Rules.NOTRUMP
        doubled - 0 if undoubled, 1 if doubled, or 2 if redoubled
        declarer - Rules.NORTH, Rules.EAST, Rules.SOUTH, or Rules.WEST

      • Contract

        public Contract(Bid b,
                int doubled,
                int declarer)
        Create a contract from the highest bid.
        Parameters:
        b - the highest bid in the auction
        doubled - 0 if undoubled, 1 if doubled, or 2 if redoubled
        declarer - Rules.NORTH, Rules.EAST, Rules.SOUTH, or Rules.WEST

    • Method Detail

      • rank

        public int rank()
        Get the rank of the contract.
        Returns:
        0-7, inclusive

      • strain

        public int strain()
        Get the strain of the contract.
        Returns:
        Rules.CLUBS, Rules.DIAMONDS, Rules.HEARTS, Rules.SPADES, or Rules.NOTRUMP

      • doubled

        public int doubled()
        Get whether the contract was doubled.
        Returns:
        0 if undoubled, 1 if doubled, or 2 if redoubled

      • declarer

        public int declarer()
        Get the player who introduced the strain of the contract.
        Returns:
        Rules.NORTH, Rules.EAST, Rules.SOUTH, or Rules.WEST

      • score

        public int score(int[] results)
        Find the score for the contract. The score is the sum of contract, overtrick, and bonus points minus undertrick points. Contract points: - NT: 40 points for the first trick, 30 points/trick after - Major suits: 30 points/trick - Minor suits: 20 points/trick - X and XX double and quadruple the score Overtrick points: - NT/H/S: 30 points/overtrick - C/D: 20 points/overtrick - X: 100 points/overtrick - XX: 200 points/overtrick Undertrick points: +-----------------------+-----------+---------+-----------+ | Number of undertricks | Undoubled | Doubled | Redoubled | |-----------------------+-----------+---------+-----------| | 1st | | 100 | 200 | |-----------------------| |---------+-----------| | 2nd and 3rd | 50 | 200 | 400 | |-----------------------| |---------+-----------| | 4th+ | | 300 | 600 | |-----------------------+-----------+---------+-----------|
        Parameters:
        results - the winners of each trick
        Returns:
        declarer's score (defender's score is the negative of the score)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
